title: Agenone
description: This digital agency landing website features a bold hero section with clear benefits, a comprehensive services section to showcase their offerings, an experience statistic to highlight their expertise, a portfolio of their past projects, testimonials from satisfied clients, and a prominent call-to-action to encourage potential clients to take the next step.

title: PracSuite
description:
PracSuite is a cloud-based practice management software that is designed to make health professionals more productive and improve their workday

The website is designed to be user-friendly and easy to navigate. The homepage features a clear call to action, inviting visitors to Try PracSuite for Free. The website also includes a number of testimonials from satisfied customers, which help to build trust and credibility.
features: Patient scheduling and management: This feature allows you to schedule appointments, track patient visits, and manage patient records.
Billing and payments: This feature allows you to process payments, track billing, and generate reports.
Reporting tool: Seco2 provides a reporting tool that allows producers to track their progress in reducing the carbon footprint of their productions.
Communication and collaboration tools: This feature allows you to communicate with patients and colleagues, and collaborate on projects.
Reporting and analytics: This feature allows you to generate reports and track your practice's performance.

title: Chat n' rechat
description: Chat n' Rechat is a landing page for a mobile chatting app, featuring a clean and modern design with a hero component showcasing the app illustration. The page includes several sections, including a list of key features, a call-to-action for users to download the app, and a frequently asked questions section.

title: Seco2
description:
Seco2 is a carbon footprint calculator for film and audiovisual productions. It is homologated by the CNC (Centre National du Cinéma et de l'Image Animée), the French national agency for cinema and the moving image. Seco2 allows producers of film and audiovisual works to calculate the carbon footprint of their productions and to take steps to reduce it.

The website provides a step-by-step guide to calculating the carbon footprint of a production, from the conception of the project to the distribution of the finished work. It also includes a database of carbon emission factors for a wide range of activities, such as transportation, filming, and post-production.

Seco2 is a valuable tool for producers who want to reduce the environmental impact of their work. It is also a requirement for producers who want to receive funding from the CNC.
features: Carbon footprint calculator: Seco2 provides a step-by-step guide to calculating the carbon footprint of a production.
Database of carbon emission factors: Seco2 includes a database of carbon emission factors for a wide range of activities, such as transportation, filming, and post-production.
Reporting tool: Seco2 provides a reporting tool that allows producers to track their progress in reducing the carbon footprint of their productions.
Certification: Seco2 is homologated by the CNC, which means that it meets the requirements of the French government for carbon footprint calculators.

title: Electron
description:
Electron's platform uses data from a variety of sources, including satellites, ground sensors, and weather models. This data is then processed and analyzed to provide insights into a variety of environmental indicators, such as carbon emissions, deforestation, and air quality.

Electron's platform is used by a variety of organizations, including governments, businesses, and NGOs. They use it to track their progress on climate change goals, identify areas where they can reduce their carbon emissions, and make informed decisions about how to manage their resources.
features: Data visualization: Electron's platform provides users with a variety of tools for visualizing data, such as maps, charts, and graphs. This makes it easy to understand complex environmental data and identify trends.

Reporting: Electron's platform generates automated reports that summarize key findings from the data. These reports can be used to track progress, identify areas for improvement, and communicate with stakeholders.

Use cases: Electron has a library of use cases that demonstrate how its platform can be used to solve real-world problems. These use cases cover a wide range of industries, including energy, agriculture, and transportation.

title: Hodlcards
description:
HodlCards is a website that sells physical collectible cards that represent Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. The cards are designed to look like trading cards, and each card features a unique design and information about the cryptocurrency it represents. HodlCards was founded in 2017 by two brothers, and the company has since sold over 1 million cards.

The website has a simple design, and it is easy to browse the different cards that are available. Users can search for cards by cryptocurrency, rarity, or price. The cards are sold in packs of 10, and each pack costs $10. HodlCards also offers a subscription service that allows users to receive a monthly pack of cards.

HodlCards is a unique way to collect and learn about cryptocurrencies. The cards are a great way to introduce people to the world of cryptocurrency, and they can also be used as a way to store and secure cryptocurrency.
features: Collectible physical cards that represent Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies
Unique designs and information about each cryptocurrency
Easy to browse and purchase cards
Subscription service that delivers a monthly pack of cards
Great way to learn about cryptocurrencies
Secure way to store and hold cryptocurrency

title: BigFriend
description: Bigfriend is a community of communication agencies and consulting firms that are dedicated to providing advice and support to businesses and individuals. The website provides information about Bigfriend's services, as well as a blog with articles on a variety of topics related to communication and marketing.
features: Communication strategy: Bigfriend can help businesses develop and implement communication strategies that are aligned with their overall business goals.
Content creation: Bigfriend can create content for businesses, including website content, blog posts, social media posts, and marketing materials.
Public relations: Bigfriend can help businesses manage their public relations efforts, including media relations, crisis communications, and event planning.

Digital marketing: Bigfriend can help businesses develop and implement digital marketing campaigns, including search engine optimization (SEO), pay-per-click (PPC) advertising, and social media marketing.

title: Bilal Arve
description: A personal website of Bilal Arve, a UI/UX designer based in Banda Aceh, Indonesia. The website is built with Next.js and TailwindCSS, and it uses Lottie animations to add some visual interest.
features: Animation: The website uses Lottie animations to add some visual interest.
Responsive design: The website is responsive and works well on mobile devices.
Accessibility: The website is accessible and works well with screen readers.

title: Travel Awal
description:
Travelawal is a travel planning website that helps users find the best deals on flights, hotels, and other travel expenses. The website also offers a variety of travel guides and articles to help users plan their trips.

The website is easy to use and navigate. Users can search for flights and hotels by destination, date, and price. The website also allows users to compare prices from different travel agencies.

Travelawal also offers a variety of travel guides and articles. These guides provide information on popular tourist destinations, as well as lesser-known gems. The articles cover a variety of topics, such as travel tips, packing lists, and cultural insights.

Overall, Travelawal is a comprehensive travel planning website that can help users save money and plan their trips with ease.
features: Search for flights and hotels: Users can search for flights and hotels by destination, date, and price.
Compare prices from different travel agencies: Travelawal allows users to compare prices from different travel agencies.
Read travel guides and articles: Travelawal offers a variety of travel guides and articles that provide information on popular tourist destinations, as well as lesser-known gems.
Save money: Travelawal can help users save money on their travel expenses.
Plan trips with ease: Travelawal can help users plan their trips with ease.
